document_data.name: Gribbla
document_data.mainbody: '''Gribbla''' was a servant of King [[Obould XVII]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.History: Just after the start of the [[Darkening]], possibly under orders from her king, Gribbla helped an adventuring party escape from the keep before they were to be killed by [[orc]] traitors allied with the [[drow]].
